body.name: Simplified To Do List Notebook - Aesthetic Daily Planner to Easily Organize Your Tasks And Boost Productivity - Stylish Undated Planner And School or Office Supplies For Women
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 2 hrs 21 mins
features: Daily Focus To Stay On Track: Ready to enjoy more free time? Staying organized has never been easier - the daily to do notebook features space for daily to do’s, notes, health & fitness tracking, a meal planner and appointments

Boost Your Productivity: Use the daily to do list notepad (8.5x6.4”) to plan & work smarter not harder for efficient daily task management; with the undated to do planner you can plan out 120 days and completely cultivate new planning habits for a major shift in your life

Great To Start Any Time: The daily to do planner is undated, so you can make each day count & start getting rid of that nasty procrastination today, no more wasting time! Everything settled? Tear-off the page & celebrate another successful day - what a feeling

Beautiful Abstract Leaves Design: Planning is so much more fun when using this eye-catching planner with to do list with its lush leaves look, golden spiral, 4 gold corners & green elastic band and a back pocket for extra space

Stay Motivated & Achieve Great Things: While tracking progress is the greatest motivator in itself, the daily list planner even makes the journey more beautiful with motivational quotes & a dedicated space for your gratitude practice
body.description: Boost Your Daily Productivity With The Daily Planner And Notebook By ZICOTO! Use ZICOTOS’ daily to do list notebook (8.5x6.4”) to plan and work smart to achieve your daily goals. By organizing and mapping out each day you can stay focused on your daily tasks, which ultimately leads to an amazing boost in productivity, less stress in exchange for more free time. Optimized organization and planning for the win! Our undated planner for to do’s & more is ready to achieve great things with you. Thanks to its beautiful, minimalist leaves design with golden accents and a green elastic band it makes boosting your productivity even more fun! The clever back pocket adds some extra space for private notes, personal goals and more! 120 Undated Tear-Off Pages - 120 Days To Plan Efficiently And …cultivate new planning habits which may have a positive influence on your life. Procrastination, wasting time or missing deadlines? Nevermore! “To do list” - with checklist to stay on top of things - “Must get done today” - setting priorities to get the most crucial tasks done - Notes & stuff - add reminders, side notes etc.- Water intake - make sure to stay hydrated to keep your mind and body in flow - Health & fitness - fitness journal & health tracker to become the best version of yourself - Meal planner - track and plan your meals seamlessly - Appointments - never forget about important deadlines or events - Gratitude - grateful people are usually more optimistic - add what you are grateful for today - Motivational quote: keeps you inspired on the way to reaching your daily goals & dreams! Easily To Stay On Track: One tick after the next - what a great feeling to have completed all the to do's by the end of the day. Each small step leads to a bigger goal - and you are on the road to success!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for.
reviews.reviewText: This daily journal/to do list is great. It is pretty and sturdy. The pages are thick and ink does not bleed through. It's has a space for almost everything it need. I would purchase from this company again. They also included a cute thank you card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don't use every feature on here but it is one of the more helpful planners I have used. I use 1 page per week and list that week's major chores. Nice to help keep track of things that need to be done and has that satisfying check box once the item is completed. I like the section to keep memories of what I am grateful for. I sometimes get too lazy/busy to keep a separate book but writing gratuity is one of the better things I do with my day. It is durable. Hard covers. Does not mash in a bag/carryall but I don't think I'd throw it in the bottom of my gym bag. Like a hardcover book but since it doesn't have as many pages as a book it could bend. It also has an elastic to keep a person's place in the journal and pockets for stuff. Or stuff to get lost in. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This notebook is just what I needed!I love how functional the layout is, and the super cute cover design is the icing on top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This To Do Planner is simple and efficient! I love how it’s undated so that if I skip certain days the pages aren’t wasted. It has little quotes at the bottom that I really like. Definitely worth buying!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and simplistic
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful book and seems to be sturdy and well made. I love it's simplicity and clean pages. I've found others to be overwhelming. I especially appreciate the quotes at the bottom of each page. The only issue with the one I received is about 20 pages are flipped upside down. Isn't a big enough problem to send back, and in every other regard, it's exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this everyday I work from home so this is a must have cute and cheap

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ADHD Friendly, Great Planner
reviews.reviewText: I have only had this a few days but it is absolutely amazing! There are no preset dates on the planner so it takes the stress off if you miss a day. Also the addition of a gratitude check in, water log and food log is stellar! I don’t need multiple log books anymore which makes it so much easier to keep track.I cannot stress enough the importance of the to do list and the must get done today list! This really makes me reflect on the extensive lists I often create and what is the most important for that day. 100/10 recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The best planner I’ve ever purchased. Includes a section for daily gratitude, meal planning and even fitness. Perfect size too
Looove this planner! It’s so nice! 10/10
Me encantó y me es muy adecuada para mis necesidades, vale la pena

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality, very pretty and simple
reviews.reviewText: I love that it is undated so you can start whenever you want and skip days without wasting pages. The colors scheme is very pretty and soft. I also really appreciate that there is no schedule with time, this is always too much for my need. The grateful part was exactly what I was looking for. Super happy to have found this pretty todo/planner!
I like that the journal doesn't come with specific date/year, so I can use it anytime. Lovely design with details such as daily gratitude, priorities, fitness, meal planning, and more.
Very cute organizational tool ! Will be using this to keep track of all my work tasks and timelines.
